name: AC Antennas
description: Manufacturer of antenna products intended to serve the marine industry. The company offers a portfolio of antennas consisting of cellular, navtex, global positioning system, television, dual-band, four-band and others as well as a wide range of mounting equipment and accessories.

name: AC Hotels
description: Owner and operator of hotels. The company provides facilities like corporate programs, dining, accommodation and wedding programs to its clients.

name: AB Tasty
description: Operator of a cloud-based conversion rate optimization platform intended to assist marketers to optimize their websites and increase conversion rates. The company's platform offers a full range of tests including A/B, split, multivariate and multi-page to modify pages and create new designs as well as provides personalization and user engagement tools, enabling companies to boost online sales by allowing marketers to understand their customers and act on this insight.

name: AC Entertainment
description: Organizer and promoter of entertainment events. The company creates, produces, books and markets live entertainment experiences - from festivals and concerts to a range of special events. It operates five Tennessee-based venues: the Tennessee Theatre, the Bijou Theatre, the Mill & Mine, the Tivoli Theatre and Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Auditorium.
